title: Meditation Retreat at Natural Bridge - Dr. Melissa Carver
cleaned_text: Description Retreat dates are April 15th & 16th 2023 You will receive a welcome email within 48 hours of purchasing your ticket. If you do not see this email please check your spam folder. Still don't see it? Contact us at info@drmelissacarver.com Tickets are non-refundable but are 100% transferable. Accommodations are not included. Our group receives 10% off of the already low prices at Shaker Village.
